mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_cart (pc_no, pc_count, m_no, p_no) VALUES (product_cart_seq.NEXTVAL, #{pc_count}, #{m_no}, #{p_no})
mapper.select: SELECT c.pc_no, c.pc_count, c.m_no, c.p_no, p.p_name, p.p_price, p.p_image FROM product_cart c JOIN product p ON c.p_no = p.p_no WHERE c.m_no = #{m_no} ORDER BY c.pc_no DESC
SELECT pc_no FROM product_cart WHERE m_no = #{m_no} AND p_no = #{p_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_cart SET pc_count = CASE WHEN (pc_count + #{pc_count}) > 5 THEN 5 ELSE (pc_count + #{pc_count}) END WHERE pc_no = #{pc_no}
